Proxy.name: WidgetBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all 3D widgets.

Proxy.name: AnimationCueBase
Proxy.Documentation: Internal base interface for all animation cues.

AnimationCueProxy.name: AnimationCue
AnimationCueProxy.Documentation: This is old style animation cue, this must be replaced by KeyFrameAnimationCue or CameraAnimationCue as the case may be. This may be used when using other types of manipulators.

AnimationCueProxy.name: CameraAnimationCue
AnimationCueProxy.Documentation: Animation cue which can be used for animating Camera using keyframes.

TimeAnimationCueProxy.name: TimeAnimationCue
TimeAnimationCueProxy.Documentation: This is same as KeyFrameAnimationCue except that it has a new property "UseAnimationTime" which when set overrides the keyframes all together and directly uses the animation clock time to update the animated property.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAnimationTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the animated property is directly updated with the value of the Animation clock. Default value it true.

ProxyProperty.name: ViewModules
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Add views to this scene. These are all the views that need to be updated when playing the animation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: StartTime
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Start Time
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the start time for the animation scene.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EndTime
DoubleVectorProperty.label: End Time
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the end time for the animation scene.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomEndTimes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the StartTime and EndTime are used as the animation start and end times. Otherwise the time range is obtained from the TimeKeeper, if set. If no time keeper is present, then StartTime and EndTime will be used irrespective of the status of this flag.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisableAutomaticTimeAdjustment
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This is a no-op property. It is set by the GUI with the user manually changes the UseCustomEndTimes, StartTime and EndTime properties. If that's done, then the GUI will no longer adjust start time/end time when data sets are loaded or new timesteps are available etc. (Look at pqAnimationScene for details on how this property affects the GUI)

IntVectorProperty.name: Caching
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if cache is to be used while playing the animation.

IntVectorProperty.name: CacheLimit
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Cache limit used to limit cache size.

ProxyProperty.name: TimeKeeper
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the time keeper. Time keeper is used to obtain the information about timesteps. This is required to play animation in "Snap To Timesteps" mode.

Proxy.name: AnimationPlayerBase
Proxy.Documentation: base interface for all animation players.

ProxyProperty.name: AnimationScene
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the animation scene to play.

IntVectorProperty.name: Loop
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to true to play the animation in a loop.

AnimationPlayerProxy.name: SequenceAnimationPlayer
AnimationPlayerProxy.Documentation: Plays the animation in a fixed number of frames. The time is evenly distributed among all the frames.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfFrames
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of frames in which to play the animation.

AnimationPlayerProxy.name: RealtimeAnimationPlayer
AnimationPlayerProxy.Documentation: Realtime animation player which plays the animation in real time i.e. in a fixed number of seconds.

IntVectorProperty.name: Duration
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the duration for playing the animation in seconds.

AnimationPlayerProxy.name: TimestepsAnimationPlayer
AnimationPlayerProxy.Documentation: Player to play an animation scene through a discrete set of time values. FramesPerTimestep controls how many frames are generated for each time value.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeSteps
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The discrete timesteps to play the animation in. Irrespective of order of the time values in this property, the player always plays in the animation in sorted order of the time step values.

IntVectorProperty.name: FramesPerTimestep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of frames per timestep.

AnimationPlayerProxy.name: AnimationPlayer
AnimationPlayerProxy.Documentation: Composite player that combines 3 animation players: sequence, realtime and timesteps.

SourceProxy.name: ChartRepresentationPreprocessor
SourceProxy.Documentation: vtkBlockDeliveryPreprocessor is an internal filter. This is used by chart representations to preprocess the table that is delivered to the client.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Extract Datasets filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: FieldAssociation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the attribute data to pass.

IntVectorProperty.name: CompositeDataSetIndex
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of Composite datasets, set the flat index of the dataset to pass. The flat index must point to a non-empty, non-composite dataset for anything to be passed through. If the input is not a composite dataset, then this index is ignored.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Extract Datasets filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: FieldAssociation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the attribute data to pass.

IntVectorProperty.name: CompositeDataSetIndex
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of Composite datasets, set the flat index of the dataset to pass. The flat index must point to a non-empty, non-composite dataset for anything to be passed through. If the input is not a composite dataset, then this index is ignored.

SourceProxy.name: TableStreamer
SourceProxy.Documentation: vtkTableStreamer is a block-based vtkTable streaming filter.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Extract Datasets filter.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: BlockSize
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the number of rows that fit within one block. The output of this filter will have at most BlockSize rows.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateOriginalIds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set (default) the vtkOriginalIndices array will be added to the output. Can be overridden by setting this flag to 0.

SourceProxy.name: SelectionStreamer
SourceProxy.Documentation: vtkSelectionStreamer is a block-based vtkSelection streaming filter. This is designed to be used in conjunction with vtkTableStreamer.

InputProperty.name: DataInput
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Extract Datasets filter.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the Extract Datasets filter.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: BlockSize
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the number of rows that fit within one block. The output of this filter will have at most BlockSize rows.

IntVectorProperty.name: FieldAssociation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the attribute data to pass.

StringVectorProperty.name: WorkingDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Override the working directory used to resolve relative paths.

TimeKeeperProxy.name: TimeKeeper
TimeKeeperProxy.Documentation: TimeKeeper is used to keep the pipeline time for the application. All views added to the timekeeper show the same time as that on the time keeper.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The timesteps currently available. This property does not have any information helper since vtkSMTimeKeeperProxy keeps this updated without any need to call UpdatePropertyInformation().

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the time range. It's possible that there are no TimestepValues but there is a valid TimeRange since some sources may provide continuous time.

ProxyProperty.name: Views
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Views with their view time linked with this time keeper.

ProxyProperty.name: TimeSources
ProxyProperty.Documentation: List of proxies that provide time. TimestepValues property has a set of timesteps provided by all the sources added to this property alone.

Proxy.name: XdmfReaderHelper
Proxy.Documentation: This proxy helps apps with the interaction of interdependent properties in the XdmfReader

ProxyProperty.name: KdTree
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the KdTree managed by this manager.

ProxyProperty.name: Producers
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Producers/algorithms producing data that needs to be distributed.

ProxyProperty.name: StructuredProducer
ProxyProperty.Documentation: The optional producer whose partitioning is used to build the KdTree.

RepresentationAnimationHelperProxy.name: RepresentationAnimationHelper
RepresentationAnimationHelperProxy.Documentation: Used to help in animation representation properties.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: X3DExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkX3DExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into an X3D file. X3D is an XML-based format for representation 3D scenes (similar to VRML). Check out http://www.web3d.org/x3d/ for more details.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: Fastest
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In binary mode use fastest instead of best compression.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: VRMLExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an VRML file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

CSVExporterProxy.name: CSVExporter
CSVExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an CSV file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: POVExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPOVExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into an POV Ray file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.
